name: Mowing Simulator - Lawn Mower
description:
Mowing Simulator is all about maintaining perfect gardens, backyards, public spots and sports facilities.

- Accept customer orders and start your lawn mowing business- Maintain your machines, their fuel and lubricants - Clean the lawn, picking up garbage (like leafs, rocks, cans)- Give water to plants/grass- Machines will be damaged on hitting certain objects. Plus they require maintenance over time.
